title: Sports (Development and Control) Ordinance, 1962
description: Official consolidated text of Sports (Development and Control) Ordinance, 1962 (XVI of 1962) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 5. Exclusive right to make rules for the development, control and uniformity of Sports
provisions.content:
throughout Pakistan
ORDINANCE N0. XVI OF 1962
[2nd May, 1962]
An Ordinance to regulate the development and control of Sports
WHEREAS it is expedient to regulate the development and control of Sports in Pakistan;
NOW, THEREFORE, in pursuance of the Proclamation of the seventh day of October, 1958,
and in exercise of all powers enabling him in that behalf, the President is pleased to make and
promulgate the following Ordinance:__

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title, extent and commencement
provisions.content:
_(1) This Ordinance shall be called the Sports
(Development and Control) Ordinance, 1962.
(2) It extends to the whole of Pakistan.
(3) It shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. Definitions
provisions.content:
_In this Ordinance, unless there is anything repugnant in the subject or
context,__
(i)       “Sports” shall include Hockey, Football, Athletics, Wrestling, Cricket,
Weight-lifting, Squash Rackets, Swimming, Boxing, Cycling, Basketball,
Golf, Volleyball, Rifle Shooting, Table Tennis, Badminton, Lawn Tennis,
Polo, Racing, Body-Building, Skiing, Mountaineering, and any other activity
which the 1[Federal Government] may, by notification in the official Gazette,
specify.
(ii)      “Board” means a Board constituted under this Ordinance, for the control of
Sports in Pakistan.

provisions.title: Section 3. Establishment of the Board
provisions.content:
_(1) As soon as may be after the commencement of this
Ordinance, the 1[Federal Government] may, for the purposes of promoting and developing uniform
standards of competition in Sports in Pakistan comparable to the standards prevailing internationally,
and regulating and controlling sports in Pakistan on a national basis, by notification in the official
Gazette, constitute, one or more boards for the control of Sports in Pakistan.
(2) A Board shall be a body corporate having perpetual succession and a common seal with
power to acquire, hold and dispose of property, both movable and immovable.
1
Subs. by F.A.O., 1975.

provisions.title: Section 4. Name, Constitution, powers and functions of a Board
provisions.content:
_The name, Constitution,
powers and functions of a Board shall be such as may be determined by the 1[Federal Government].

definitions.definition: a Board constituted under this Ordinance, for the control of Sports in Pakistan.
